operation: Get Vaults Accessible by Current User
operationSummary: Get Vaults Accessible by Current User
operationDescription: Retrieves a list of vaults that are accessible by the current user.
Fetch the document vault attached to the current session.
Retrieves the vaults that are on-line and available for the user on the server.

operation: Get Collection of Objects in the Document Vault
operationSummary: Get Collection of Objects in the Document Vault
operationDescription: Retrieves objects. The amount of returned objects is limited by the server, by default to 500 items.

operation: Get Collection of Objects Filtered by Object Type
operationSummary: Get Collection of Objects Filtered by Object Type
operationDescription: Retrieves objects of the given type. The amount of returned objects is limited by the server.
Retrieves objects of the given type. The amount of returned objects is limited by the server.

parameters.name: {objType}
parameters.description: Specify the type of object.

parameters.name: {objId}
parameters.description: Represents the identifier of an object.

operation: Set the Check Out Status of the Object
operationSummary: Set the Check Out Status of the Object
operationDescription: Sets the check out status. This is allowed only when the object isn't checked out to someone else, that is when the check out status isn't CheckedOut.

operationDescription: Destroys the object version. As checked in versions cannot be destroyed this can only be performed on a checked out version and is equivalent to an undo checkout. Returns the new ObjectVersion information if it is still visible to the user.
